update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.Ball
Method that is called when the ball position changes.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.PlayerBrick
Method that is called from PlayerState to update the player brick position as the user inputs control.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.GameOverState
Method that is constantly called to then call handleInput.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.GameStateManager
Calls the update method for the current game state.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.LevelSelectState
Method constantly called that calls handleInput in its body to handle user clicks.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.MenuState
Method constantly called that then calls handleInput to record button changes.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.PlayState
Method called to constantly check user input as well as game state changes such as if the user has crushed all the bricks or if the user has crushed a particular brick on the screen.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.PreferencesState
Method that constantly calls handleInput to check for setting changes and then setting boolean variables according to those changes.
update(float) - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.states.State
Method that is constantly called to update the screen
updateBricks() - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.BrickManager
Called from the update method in the PlayState class to update each brick status.
